name: Add Textline customers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new customer created in Textline, Make will automatically add that customer to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Ojk6APW7KVur0KTjPV5GXlcY7UEH4KyBdwgdhYO3Ebc/edit?usp=sharing).
